Jain University Online

Bengaluru

4.5 (127 user ratings)
★★★★★ 4.5/5

Study Mode: Distance

Institution Type : Private

About Jain Deemed University

Jain Online is the e-learning platform of the prestigious Jain Deemed To Be University located in Bengaluru. The Jain Group has 30 years of experience and credibility in providing quality education. The university excels not just in education but also in the field of research and entrepreneurship.

The vision of Jain Online is to provide higher education degrees without compromising the quality of education to students from the comfort of their homes and to working professionals who are looking to upscale their knowledge and career.

The university is approved by UGC-DEB to offer courses in online mode. It has been ranked among the top 100 Indian universities program by QS World Ranking and has been awarded 5 stars in the Young Universities category program. The NIRF has also ranked Jain Deemed To Be University among the top 100 Indian universities. Jain University is also an authorized partner for the “Study in India (SII)” program.

The university offers UG, PG, Certifications, and PGCP courses in online mode in the domains of Management, Commerce, Computer Applications, and Arts. Jain Online offers some professional courses in collaboration with accredited universities in the UK and USA. The university constitutes more than 7 leading global professional bodies as collaborators, 70+ electives taught, 2000+ hiring corporates, and 20K+ courses on LinkedIn Learning. The curriculum taught by Jain Online is at par with the on-campus programs and is taught by the same world renowned faculty.

Jain Deemed University has a diverse student community, comprising students from across the country and international students as well. The university is committed to providing quality education, fostering research and innovation, and preparing students for successful careers.

Apart from academics, the university has a vibrant campus life with numerous student clubs and societies promoting extracurricular activities such as sports, music, dance, and arts. Jain Deemed University has also forged partnerships with leading universities and industries across the world to provide students with the opportunity to gain international exposure and experiences. Overall, Jain Deemed University is a dynamic and progressive institution that aims to provide a holistic education to its students.

Approvals
  • UGC-DEB
  • AICTE
  • NIRF
  • NAAC A++
Jain University Online Admission Process

  • There is an online admission procedure for taking admission in Jain Online which means no need to go to the campus for the admissions. Fresh admissions generally starts in the month of January and July month of every year. Admissions are done on direct basis which means no need to take an entrance test to apply for the admission in Jain Online. The admission procedure 2023 for the online courses at Jain Online University is as follows:

    Step1: Visit Jain Online official website and click on the “Apply Now” button

    Step2: Register yourself with your basic details for verification of email and mobile number

    Step3: After email verification, you will receive login details

    Step4: Login and fill out the online enrollment form and upload the required documents.

    Step5: Pay the fee using either Net Banking or Credit/Debit card. There are easy EMI options as well with 0% interest.

List of Documents
    • Marksheets
    • Residential Proof
    • Proof of Date of Birth
    • Government Issued ID
    • Photocopy of Disability Certificate/ Employment certificate/ Service proof in case of Defense or Paramilitary forces (if applicable)
    • Undertaking by the applicant in case of any pendency (Result awaited/ Reappear/Backlog or any other pendency)
    • Undertaking for Gap Period (if applicable)
    • Two passport size colored photographs
    • Demand Draft (DD) for the prescribed fee

Why Jain Deemed University

Jain Online is approved by UGC-DEB to offer courses in online mode.

The curriculum for each course is relevant to its corresponding industry and has been designed by expert academicians from across the globe.

Jain online has collaborations with 7+ leading global professional bodies from the UK and the US to teach some professional courses.

Jain University has 2000+ hiring corporates including leading brands and corporates like KPMG, Infosys, Facebook, EY, Google, Flipkart, and many more.

Jain Online conducts several on-campus events, workshops, and contests for a better learning experience.

There are also provisions for international study tours for global exposure so that students can grow exponentially.
